title: eTlaa kanugondunO
sahitya:
eTlA kanugondunO shrI harini nEn-



anupallavi



cuTlara gaDiya dOvaku nA madilOni jAli delipi vibhunitO

delpuvArin-



caraNam 1



dharalO galugu sampadala rOsi tanuvunu maraci harini gUDu

maharAjulaku gAkan-



caraNam 2



malayani madamuna deliyakuNTini gAni alanADe sadayuni

nanusarincaka bOtinEn-



caraNam 3



cinna prAyamuna nADE shrI haripai nAsa konna jIvuDagAnu

kOdaNDapAni nEn-



caraNam 4



 I janma mI bhAgya mI sommu lella prayOjanamA tyAgarAja

vinutuni nEn-
